content: this is a simple typing test for lowercase practice with basic words that are commonly used in everyday writing
the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog this pangram contains every letter of the alphabet at least once
Hello, world! How are you today? I hope you're doing well. This test includes punctuation marks like commas, periods, and question marks.
She said, "I love programming!" The code was written in JavaScript, Python, and TypeScript. What's your favorite language?
